00028 bool getbit(const integer& n, size_t bit) {
00029     size_t index=bit/bits_per_digit;
00030     if (index < n._get_length()) {
00031         digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00032         return ((n._get_digit(index) & mask) != 0);
00033     } else return false;
00034 }
00035 
00036 void setbit(integer& n, size_t bit) {
00037     n._make_unique();
00038     detail::data_t *ndata=n._get_data();
00039 
00040     size_t index=bit/bits_per_digit;
00041     if (index >= n._get_length()) ndata->realloc(index+1);
00042 
00043     digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00044     ndata->digits[index] |= mask;
00045     ndata->skipLeadingZeros();
00046 }
00047 
00048 void clearbit(integer& n, size_t bit) {
00049     size_t index=bit/bits_per_digit;
00050     if (index < n._get_length()) {
00051         n._make_unique();
00052         digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00053         n._get_data()->digits[index] &= ~mask;
00054         n._get_data()->skipLeadingZeros();
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 size_t lowestbit(const integer& n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00059     if (n.sign()==0) return valueIfZero;
00060 
00061     const detail::data_t *ndata=n._get_data();
00062     const digit_t *p=ndata->digits, *pe=p+ndata->mLength;
00063     while (p!=pe && *p==0) ++p;
00064 
00065     size_t index=(p - ndata->digits);
00066     size_t r=(bits_per_digit * index);
00067     digit_t digit=*p;
00068 
00069     while ((digit & 0x01)==0) {
00070         digit>>=1;
00071         ++r;
00072     }
00073 
00074     return r;
00075 }
00076 
00077 size_t highestbit(const integer& n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00078     if (n.sign()==0) return valueIfZero;
00079     return static_cast<size_t>(log2(n)-1);
00080 }
00081 
00082 integer bitwise_and(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00083     const detail::data_t *smaller=n1._get_data(), *larger=n2._get_data();
00084     if (smaller->mLength > larger->mLength) std::swap(smaller, larger);
00085 
00086     integer r;
00087     detail::data_t *rdata=r._get_data();
00088     rdata->alloc(smaller->mLength);
00089 
00090     const digit_t *s1=smaller->digits, *s1e=s1+smaller->mLength, *s2=larger->digits;
00091     digit_t *t=rdata->digits;
00092 
00093     while (s1 < s1e) *t++ = *s1++ & *s2++;
00094 
00095     rdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00096     return r;
00097 }
00098 
00099 integer bitwise_or(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00100     const detail::data_t *smaller=n1._get_data(), *larger=n2._get_data();
00101     if (smaller->mLength > larger->mLength) std::swap(smaller, larger);
00102 
00103     integer r;
00104     detail::data_t *rdata=r._get_data();
00105     rdata->alloc(larger->mLength);
00106 
00107     const digit_t *s1=smaller->digits, *s1e=s1+smaller->mLength;
00108     const digit_t *s2=larger->digits, *s2e=s2+larger->mLength;
00109     digit_t *t=rdata->digits;
00110 
00111     while (s1<s1e) *t++ = *s1++ | *s2++;
00112     while (s2<s2e) *t++ = *s2++;
00113 
00114     rdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00115     return r;
00116 }
00117 
00118 integer bitwise_xor(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00119     const detail::data_t *smaller=n1._get_data(), *larger=n2._get_data();
00120     if (smaller->mLength > larger->mLength) std::swap(smaller, larger);
00121 
00122     integer r;
00123     detail::data_t *rdata=r._get_data();
00124     rdata->alloc(larger->mLength);
00125 
00126     const digit_t *s1=smaller->digits, *s1e=s1+smaller->mLength;
00127     const digit_t *s2=larger->digits, *s2e=s2+larger->mLength;
00128     digit_t *t=rdata->digits;
00129 
00130     while (s1<s1e) *t++ = *s1++ ^ *s2++;
00131     while (s2<s2e) *t++ = *s2++;
00132 
00133     rdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00134     return r;
00135 }
00136 
00137 integer shift(const integer& n, int byBits) {
00138     if (byBits > 0) return shift_left(n, byBits);
00139     else return shift_right(n, -byBits);
00140 }
00141 
00142 integer shift_left(const integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00143     if (byBits==0) return n;
00144 
00145     integer nn(n);
00146     nn._make_unique();
00147     nn._get_data()->shift_left(byBits);
00148     return nn;
00149 }
00150 
00151 integer shift_right(const integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00152     if (byBits==0) return n;
00153 
00154     integer nn(n);
00155     nn._make_unique();
00156     nn._get_data()->shift_right(byBits);
00157     return nn;
00158 }

00172 bool getbit(const integer& n, size_t bit) {
00173     try {
00174         return getbit(core::integer(n), bit);
00175     } catch (std::exception&) {
00176         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00177         else return false;
00178     }
00179 }
00180 
00188 void setbit(integer& n, size_t bit) {
00189     try {
00190         core::integer nn(n);
00191         setbit(nn, bit);
00192         n=integer(nn);
00193     } catch (std::exception&) {
00194         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00195     }
00196 }

00205 void clearbit(integer& n, size_t bit) {
00206     try {
00207         core::integer nn(n);
00208         clearbit(nn, bit);
00209         n=integer(nn);
00210     } catch (std::exception&) {
00211         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00212     }
00213 }

00230         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;

00261 integer bitwise_and(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00262     try {
00263         return integer(bitwise_and(core::integer(n1), core::integer(n2)));
00264     } catch (std::exception&) {
00265         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00266         else return integer::nan();
00267     }
00268 }

00277     try {
00278         return integer(bitwise_or(core::integer(n1), core::integer(n2)));
00279     } catch (std::exception&) {
00280         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00281         else return integer::nan();
00282     }

00309 integer shift(const integer& n, int byBits) {
00310     if (byBits > 0) return shift_left(n, byBits);
00311     else return shift_right(n, -byBits);
00312 }

00321 integer shift_left(const integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00322     try {
00323         return integer(shift_left(core::integer(n), byBits));
00324     } catch (std::exception&) {
00325         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00326         else return integer::nan();
00327     }
00328 }

00337 integer shift_right(const integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00338     try {
00339         return integer(shift_right(core::integer(n), byBits));
00340     } catch (std::exception&) {
00341         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00342         else return integer::nan();
